For Associations

Here are some example tools that can meet your needs

Project Management :

Project management tools like Trello ou Kanboard, allow you to organize tasks, participants, and deadlines.

Task Automation :

 To free yourself from repetitive, low-value-added tasks such as sorting emails, duplicating similar information across different files, sending a confirmation email after registration, applications like Zapier ou IFTTT can help.

Brainstorming, Mapping, Innovation :

Collaborative tools dedicated to workshops, co-creation sessions, brainstorming, or mind mapping, such as Mural, Lucichart ou Framindmap...

Website Creation :

No-code solutions will allow you to create your website with just a few clicks, without the need for coding, either in the form of a simple self-hosted one-page website with Strinkingly ou Carrd for example.

Image Creation :

To animate your social networks, illustrate your website,
Canva remains essential.
If you're interested in artificial intelligence, then try Dall.e which will help you create images from words.

Content Creation :

Here too, artificial intelligence can assist you, with Jasper ou Rytr ...

For Very Small Businesses

To reduce your costs...

Process Automation :

Use software to automate repetitive tasks such as invoicing, payroll management, or customer tracking.

Online Management Tools :

Use online management tools to streamline operations, such as inventory management, accounting, and HR.

Communication and Collaboration :

Adopt online communication and collaboration tools to reduce travel costs and improve efficiency.

To increase your revenue...

E-commerce :

Create or enhance an e-commerce website to sell products or services online.
This allows you to reach a wider audience and sell 24/7.

Digital Marketing :

Use digital marketing tools such as SEO (Search Engine Optimization), social media, and email marketing to attract and retain customers.

Cross-Selling and Upselling :

Offer complementary products or premium versions on online platforms.

Online Marketplaces :

Use marketplace platforms like Amazon, eBay, or Etsy to reach new customers.
